short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you adjust speed, saturation, contrast, and vibrance of media in websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows users to apply a custom dark mode to any website, making it easier on the eyes and perfect for late-night study sessions. Specifically built for students, it helps enhance productivity by reducing eye strain during long hours of reading or coding online. Whether you're studying, researching, or watching educational videos, this extension provides a comfortable dark mode experience across all websites, promoting better focus and reducing screen fatigue.

Along with that you can control the playback speed of any video in most of the websites and can also apply dark mode to videos (invert), and other filters like saturation, contrast, and brightness.
